properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Oregon Inlet NC to Cape Hatteras NC out to 20 nm; S of Cape Hatteras NC to Ocracoke Inlet NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm; S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 8 at 1:20AM EST until January 8 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND ELEVATED SEAS CONTINUE THROUGH WEDNESDAY...

.Gusty west to northwest winds behind a cold front will gradually
decrease overnight, then increase some during the day Wednesday.
Winds and seas expected to drop below advisory levels for all
waters Wednesday night.

* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and rough
waters.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Oregon Inlet to Surf City, and
the coastal waters from Duck to Oregon Inlet.

* WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
